attributes.action: Make Special constables, Police officers after 2 years service in the special constablary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think there should be a transfer scheme in place so that serving special constables are guarenteed a career with there serving force after serving as a special constable for 2 years.
The recruitment process for special constables and police constables are the same, so there should be no need to fill out another application form or complete any tests, as they have been done allready in the recruitment process to become special constables.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
